## Mathematical model

-   $Y_{ijk} = \mu + \alpha_i + \beta_j +\epsilon_{ijk}$
    -   i=1,...,a levels of the first categorical variable
    -   j=1,...,b levels of the second categorical variable
    -   k=1,..,n replicates with first and second categories
